column3: a lot of people complain about the portion size and prices here
column4: but I have always enjoyed Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba.  The food is consistent
column5: and if you come in a smaller group to sample lots of things and have some of their delicious cava sangria  then you will not leave unhappy.  In the summer
column6: the patio is great.  Choose an off night unless you want to wait--even with reservations.
